Token.Abstract: Interface to objects, that can change the behaviour of a class' method.
Creates puppet according to a given entry for the specified seed, by replacing the original behaviour with a new

Parameter.Name: entry
Parameter.Abstract: The entry specifying the victim class, selector and behaviour

Parameter.Name: seed
Parameter.Abstract: An integer value to make the invocations on the puppets deterministic

Token.Abstract: Dismisses the puppets for a given entry

Parameter.Name: entry
Parameter.Abstract: The entry specifying the victim class, selector and behaviour
